code: import Pagination from"@material-ui/lab/Pagination";import React from"react";import{useDispatch,useSelector}from"react-redux";import{getCollectionAction,setPageAction}from"../../redux/searcherDuck";var Paginator=function Paginator(){var totalPages=useSelector(function(state){return state.searcher.totalPages;});var currentPage=useSelector(function(state){return state.searcher.page;});var dispatch=useDispatch();var handleChangePage=function handleChangePage(event,value){dispatch(setPageAction(value));dispatch(getCollectionAction());};return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"paginator"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Pagination,{page:currentPage?currentPage:1,count:totalPages,shape:"rounded",size:"large",onChange:handleChangePage}));};export default Paginator;
